name: Kira of the Wind (Erika McCorkle)
description:

♠️Autistic Ace Vampire 🧛‍♀️ she/her

tweet: @asrs_williams They serve whatever roles are best suited for their personality. Lulu, Sawyer, Flamboil, Liqua, and Windesoar are more active in 'ruling' the dominion. The others stay out of politics either due to disinterest or fear of failure.

tweet:
@asrs_williams His husband Su is a Godblood (the descendant of a God), though Su doesn't say which God he descends from. 
Tynan is the grandchild of Lucognidus and Sawyer. They don't really worship their grandfathers, but they have a deep respect for them and must obey them.

@camiscribbles Bio mom was "Mom" and I never knew my bio dad.

I was raised by my grandparents who were "Grandma" and "Papa." Only realized when I was a teenager that the reason for "Papa" instead of "Grandpa" was because he wasn't bio and the idea was I'd call my bio grandpa "Grandpa."

Ch 6 / Feb 2016 1: Yuki meets a girl named Shiloh while grocery shopping and the two are instantly into each other. Being teenagers, they both feel

name: Kira of the Wind (Erika McCorkle)
description:
Fantasy Author with @ShadowSparkPub ⚡ 
Out now! 🌈MERCHANTS OF KNOWLEDGE AND MAGIC
♠️Autistic Ace Vampire 🧛‍♀️ she/her
✨Kira✨Magic✨ pfp/banner by @CrossRoadArt
tweet: Anyway, Yuki realizes his phone is missing and realizes he left it in Hikari’s room. Or more accurately, Hikari hid it so Yuki would have to come back for it, and she could spend more time with him. She breaks down in tears, and maaan, this is such a touching scene.

Amiere believes in the Gods, but doesn't worship them.

Tynan is a Godblood. Their grandfathers are Lucognidus and Sawyer. They don't really worship them, but they do respect them a lot.
